summary:
This mod allows any npcs (provided with valid Voicetype i.e Female Eventoned,Female Youngeager,
MaleNord,Male Youngeager) sing songs for you anywhere in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows any npc (provided with valid Voicetype i.e Female Eventoned,Female Youngeager,
MaleNord,Male Youngeager) sing songs for you anywhere in Skyrim.

It Doesn't matter either they are bards, Followers,Housecarls,farmers.Blacksmiths,Vendors,spouses they just sings for you.
author: Praveen
